name: LIGHTWEIGHT!
description:
YEAH BUDDY! It's CHEST DAY! 

... Again! ... 

But it's time to finally become the real GIGACHAD on the gym, so it's until REAL failure: "NO PAIN NO GAIN" as they say.

JUST DO IT! Make your dreams come true!... or die tryin! 

LIGHTWEIGHT! is a mini game based on GTA: San Andreas gym minigames.
Created in 3-4 days.

Contains curses... mostly in portuguese btw.

How to play:
Spam Left Arrow and Right Arrow as fast as you can.

Feel free to post highscores on the comments.
